name: Neighbor
text: Thank you for saving me, I can't thank you enough. Just wait for a while here I will get stuff from my house.

name: Neighbor
text: Here is a faceshield, you'll need more protection than that if you are going to stay longer outside.

name: Neighbor
text: I can't find any other way to repay your kindness since my supply is low and I'm out of food.
Thank you very much. Here I have some extra food. Take them.

name: Neighbor
text: Well if you say so. Thank you very much!
